about_the_game:
This is a dark, soul like role-playing game, trying to create a different experience in this genre. The protagonist fights against a powerful enemy in this city in search of a divine artifact.

In addition to honing their combat skills, the characteristics and strategic analysis of skill combinations are also particularly important for players. The game has designed three sets of active and passive systems to quickly familiarize and combine these skills, which plays a good role in quickly defeating and suppressing enemies. The game adopts a multi branch plot mode, where the order of defeating the forked path will affect the original boss or plot structure, making the plot and drops slightly different. Increasing efforts to explore treasures and adventures can greatly reduce the difficulty of facing enemies.

The game features a rich skill combination strategy, a tumultuous storyline, and dozens of enemies with different mechanisms.
detailed_description:
Update plan

There will be further expansion content in the future, please look forward to it.


As for the production team

This is the second iteration of our action game development. Unlike before, we have made progress this time. Currently, our investment and experience cannot be compared to other major games of the same type, and it can only be a small action game. Although as players, it is understandable to compare it with a major game, and the development team fully understands and agrees with this, it is inevitable. However, as a conscientious development team, we still provide sincere prompts before purchasing.
﻿
1. The current game action details are relatively stiff, but if they can adapt, they will receive good positive feedback.
2. The game's combat system is built around fast-paced defense and counterattacks, with deep details to explore and easy to learn but difficult to master.
3. For players who are used to playing major games of the same type and cannot tolerate flaws, it is recommended to try, observe, or swipe away.
﻿
Thank you again to the players who have been following and supporting us all along. We will continue to work hard until one day we can produce even better works.
﻿


Summary of Version Issues&Temporary Solutions

Problem 1: Some models of controllers may have conflicts and unsuccessful key changes, or may experience continuous attacks or sprints due to logging out of a certain key position.
Solution: Open the settings interface and go to Custom Settings to restore default settings. If you need to change keys, it is recommended to use the Xbox Series controller.

Problem 2: Currently, there are conflicts between PS controllers and some non XBOX controllers with keyboards and mice, which can result in the inability to open games using controllers or keyboards.
Solution: Unplug the USB cable from the controller, restart the computer and Steam, play with the keyboard and mouse throughout, or switch to using the XBOX native controller.

Problem 3: The current version has some performance consumption.
Solution: For players who need a smooth experience, it is recommended to default or reduce the resolution, UI display, texture, and shadow settings. It is strongly recommended to default the parameters, unless recording a show, otherwise the text prompts for boss battles will be blocked.
